Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local storm
local slashAnim local swordSound
Tool.Enabled = true
local firePart = Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") local storeWeld = Sword:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil or firePart == nil do firePart = Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") storeWeld = Sword:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") wait() end
local anims = {Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("Slash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("ToFace"), Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash")}
function choiceIsYours(key) if vCharacter == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end key = key:lower() if key == "q" then storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") if storm and storm.Value == 0 then storm.Value = 1 end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anims = {Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("Slash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("ToFace"), Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash")} if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end Tool.Enabled = false tick() local slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(anims[math.random(1, #anims)]) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end swordSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("SwordSound") wait(0.1) if swordSound then swordSound:Play() end wait(1.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if storeWeld then local reWeld = storeWeld:Clone() reWeld.Parent = Sword end if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(choiceIsYours) end end
function onUnequipped() -- do nothing if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if swordSound then swordSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local snake = Instance.new("Part") snake.FormFactor = 3 snake.Shape = "Block" snake.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) snake.CanCollide = false snake.Transparency = 0.7
local snakeBullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") snakeBullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57810032" snakeBullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=57809568" snakeBullet.Parent = snake snakeBullet.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
local snakeFire = Instance.new("Fire") snakeFire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) snakeFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 153/255, 1) snakeFire.Parent = snake snakeFire.Size = 2.0 snakeFire.Heat = 2.0
local snakeDamage = 12 local damage = 24
local bg
local slowCo = nil
local torsoFrame = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") while storm == nil do wait() storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function pierce(missile, hit) local humanoid if missile then if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(snakeDamage) end end end end
function slow(humanoid) if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 10.0 wait(4.0) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer)
humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if slowCo == nil or coroutine.status(slowCo) == "dead" then slowCo = coroutine.create(function() slow(humanoid) end) coroutine.resume(slowCo) end end end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) end
function swordDown() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1 , 0) end
function cyclone() if myTorso == nil then return end
bg = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bg.P = 100000 bg.maxTorque = Vector3.new(bg.P, bg.P, bg.P) bg.Name = "BG"
torsoFrame[1] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 1*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[2] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 2*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[3] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0) torsoFrame[4] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 4*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[5] = myTorso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 5*math.pi/3, 0) torsoFrame[6] = myTorso.CFrame
bg.Parent = myTorso
for i = 1, 60 do local c = i%6 + 1 if bg then bg.cframe = torsoFrame[c] end wait() end if bg then bg:Remove() end end
function destroyEverything() local sign = 1 local missiles = {} storm = Tool:FindFirstChild("Storm") if storm and storm.Value == 1 then vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
laughSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("Laugh") if laughSound then laughSound:Play() end
--myTorso.Anchored = true myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0
local initDirection = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(cyclone))
swordDown()
for i = 1, 150 do local direction if (i)%30.0 == 0 then wait(0.25) end local num = i%30 if num == 0 then direction = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector else direction = CFrame.Angles(0, (num-1) * sign * math.pi/15, 0) * myTorso.CFrame.lookVector end local spawnPos = (Sword.Position - Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)) + direction * 4.0 sign = sign * -1
missiles[i] = snake:Clone() missiles[i].CFrame = (CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)) missiles[i].Velocity = direction * 70.0 missiles[i].RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, missiles[i]:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = missiles[i]
missiles[i].Parent = game.Workspace
missiles[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) pierce(missiles[i], hit) end) debris:AddItem(missiles[i], 1.25) end -- wait(0.75) swordUp() --myTorso.Anchored = false if bg then bg:Remove() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 wait(30.0) storm.Value = 0 end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() torsoFrame = {} if bg then bg:Remove() end end
storm.Changed:connect(destroyEverything)
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)
